Package nl.han.ica.oopg.sound

Class Sound

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.sound.Sound
public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
Used to play music files.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Sound​(GameEngine engine, java.lang.String soundFileLocation)
    Create a new sound object to play music files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cue​(int millis)
    Sets the position to milliseconds from the beginning.
    ddf.minim.AudioPlayer getAudio()
    Returns the audioPlayer.
    boolean isLooping()
    Returns true if this is currently playing and has more than one loop left to play.
    boolean isPlaying()
    Returns true if this currently playing.
    int length()
    Returns the length of the sound in milliseconds.
    void loop​(int num)
    Set this to loop times, set a negative value to loop continuous
    int loopCount()
    Returns the number of loops left to do.
    void pause()
    Pauses playback.
    void play()
    Starts playback from the current position.
    void play​(int skip)
    Starts playback millis from the beginning.
    int position()
    Returns how many milliseconds the song has played.
    void rewind()
    Rewinds to the beginning.
    void skip​(int millis)
    Skips millis from the current position.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sound

      public Sound​(GameEngine engine, java.lang.String soundFileLocation)
      Create a new sound object to play music files.
      Parameters:
      engine - The GameEngine
      soundFileLocation - The location of the SoundFile

  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play()
      Starts playback from the current position.

    • play

      public void play​(int skip)
      Starts playback millis from the beginning.
      Parameters:
      skip - number of millis from the start

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Pauses playback.

    • loop

      public void loop​(int num)
      Set this to loop times, set a negative value to loop continuous
      Parameters:
      num - amount of loops

    • isLooping

      public boolean isLooping()
      Returns true if this is currently playing and has more than one loop left to play.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if looping

    • isPlaying

      public boolean isPlaying()
      Returns true if this currently playing.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if playing

    • cue

      public void cue​(int millis)
      Sets the position to milliseconds from the beginning.
      Parameters:
      millis - position in milliseconds

    • skip

      public void skip​(int millis)
      Skips millis from the current position.
      Parameters:
      millis - skips in milliseconds

    • rewind

      public void rewind()
      Rewinds to the beginning.

    • loopCount

      public int loopCount()
      Returns the number of loops left to do.
      Returns:
      number of loops left

    • length

      public int length()
      Returns the length of the sound in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      length in milliseconds

    • position

      public int position()
      Returns how many milliseconds the song has played.
      Returns:
      milliseconds that the song has played.

    • getAudio

      public ddf.minim.AudioPlayer getAudio()
      Returns the audioPlayer. Only use this function if you want to use audio analyses.
      Returns:
      AudioPlayer, this is a class in the minim library that this gameEngine uses to play sound.
